item.description:
Feel like dancing? Feel like socializing? Do you like to listen to live music? Then come out to Lowell with us for a night of fun, dancing and listening to the great sounds of The River City Band!

The River City Band is a local band that plays classic rock and pop. Some of you might have seen them at Palmers in Andover, The Claddaugh in Lawrence, or at other venues.

We have been invited by a friend to his private party for a night of dancing and socializing. The River City Band will be playing from 8:15 pm - Midnight. This is an annual event that our friend organizes for close friends and family. Because this is a private event, we have to limit the amount of people and also prepay for our tickets. If you're interested, please contact Janet by e-mail via this site to set up payment arrangements.

The schedule for the night is as follows:

Cocktail Hour 7:15 pm
Music 8:15 pm - Midnight

Price: $15.00 per person in advance; there will be no tickets at the door

RSVP Deadline: Unfortunately, we can only give one week notice and need payment by Friday, November 6.

At the request of this friend, we will not be able to display our Meetup sign. Please meet us at the front door NO LATER than 7:15 pm. We will be there at 7 pm. If you're running late or are lost, a contact number will be available a day prior to all those who will be attending.

So throw those dancing shoes on and get ready to boogie. Hope to see you at the party.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the front door no later than 7:15pm
item.name: The River City Band in Lowell
